channel.title: Loosing custom items on death
channel.description:
[b]Loosing custom made items on death[/b]
Hia guys, ive recently had a problem of making my players keep dragon claws when they die, ive tried eerything, most people say make a method or an int i have no idea how to, any help will be great thanks!

item.title: Loosing custom items on death
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Search for:

void youdied()

Under that, find:

for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {

There should be two lines line that ^^

Under those lines, there’s another line with this:

if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {

Change both of those lines to this:

if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000 && rr != ####) {

Where #### is D Claw’s ID.

Read full topic

item.title: Loosing custom items on death
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Tip, change ya font colour of green… It hurts

Read full topic
